name: May_2022_100DollarGameJam_Orb Survival
description:
Welcome to Orb Survival

Just a basic survival game made for a game jam hosted by JTAgames...using his teleportation tutorial.

Instructions

Survive as long as possible while destroying robots...the teleporter relocates its position every 20 seconds so try and get to it...Unfortunately there are no extra lives....You have to survive with the one you have. You have to wait for teleporters to recharge every 25 seconds before you can access it...Time slows down for five seconds after you teleport....I guess this isn't an advantage because you are also slowed down...X or RightMouseButton while aiming at a teleporter to teleport, Z to fire orbs, Space to Jump, Escape Key to pause, WASD or ARROW keys to move....
